description.english: Prayed to the Goddess for the first time in single player mode.
description.german: Das erste Mal im Einzelspielermodus zur Göttin gebetet.
description.french: Prier la déesse pour la première fois en mode solo.
description.italian: Hai pregato la Dea per la prima volta in modalità Giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Has rezado a la Diosa por primera vez en el modo de un jugador.
description.japanese: シングルプレイヤーモードで初めて女神に祈りを捧げた

description.english: Offered a total of 3000G to the Goddess in a quest in single player mode.
description.german: Der Göttin in einer Einzelspieler-Quest 3.000G geopfert.
description.french: Offrir 3000 G à la déesse au cours d'une quête en mode solo.
description.italian: Hai offerto un totale di 3.000G alla Dea in una sola missione in modalità Giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Has ofrecido 3.000G a la Diosa en una misión en el modo de un jugador.
description.japanese: シングルプレイヤーモードで１回のクエストで女神に通算3000G捧げた

description.english: Became 30 times the True Hero in multiplayer mode.
description.german: 30 Mal Wahrer Held im Mehrspieler-Modus geworden.
description.french: Devenir 30 fois le vrai héros en mode multijoueur.
description.italian: Sei diventato il Vero Eroe 30 volte in modalità multigiocatore.
description.spanish: Has sido Héroe verdadero 30 veces en el modo multijugador.
description.japanese: マルチプレイで30回真の勇者になった

description.english: Cleared Hero 300 in Hard Mode.
description.french: Terminer Héros 300 en mode difficile.
description.italian: Hai superato Eroe 300 al livello Difficile.
description.spanish: Te has pasado Héroe 300 en modo difícil.
description.japanese: ハードモードで勇者300をクリアした

description.english: Cleared "Cursed Hero" without defeating Sasha.
description.german: „Verwunschener Held“ abgeschlossen, ohne Sasha zu töten.
description.french: Terminer "Héros maudit" sans avoir vaincu Sasha.
description.italian: Hai completato L'Eroe maledetto senza sconfiggere Sasha.
description.spanish: Has completado "El héroe maldito" sin derrotar a Sasha.
description.japanese: サーシャを倒さずに「呪いと勇者」をクリア

description.english: Allied with all available NPCs.
description.french: S'allier à tous les PNJs disponibles.
description.italian: Hai reclutato tutti i personaggi non controllabili disponibili.
description.spanish: Te has aliado con todos los personajes no jugables disponibles.
description.japanese: 仲間になるNPCをすべて仲間にした

description.english: Cleared Hero 30.
description.french: Terminer Héros 30.
description.italian: Hai superato Eroe 30.
description.spanish: Has completado Héroe 30.
description.japanese: 勇者30をクリアした

description.english: Cleared Hero 300.
description.french: Terminer Héros 300.
description.italian: Hai superato Eroe 300.
description.spanish: Has completado Héroe 300.
description.japanese: 勇者300をクリア

description.english: Cleared Hero 3.
description.french: Terminer Héros 3.
description.italian: Hai superato Eroe 3.
description.spanish: Has completado Héroe 3.
description.japanese: 勇者3をクリア

description.english: Got all available equipment in single player mode.
description.french: Obtenir tous les équipements disponibles en mode solo.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutto l'equipaggiamento in modalità "Un giocatore".
description.spanish: Has logrado todas las piezas de equipo en el modo de un jugador.
description.japanese: シングルプレイで手に入るすべての装備品を手に入れた

displayName.japanese: マルチエンドマスター

description.english: Reached every ending in Hero 30.
description.german: Jedes der Enden in Held 30 erreicht.
description.french: Atteindre toutes les fins en Héros 30.
description.italian: Hai visto tutte le sequenze finali di Eroe 30.
description.spanish: Has visto todos los finales de Héroe 30.
description.japanese: 勇者30のエンディングをコンプリートした

description.english: Received every title.
description.french: Obtenir tous les titres.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti i titoli disponibili.
description.spanish: Has recibido todos los títulos.
description.japanese: すべての称号を獲得した

description.english: Obtain Barrel Armor and Barrel Head
description.french: Obtenir une armure tonneau et un casque tonneau
description.italian: Ottieni la Barilarmatura e la Bariltesta.
description.spanish: Obtén una armadura de barril y una cabeza de barril
description.japanese: タルヘッドとタルアーマーを入手する

description.english: Get a companion to join you.
description.german: Jemanden dazu gebracht, sich dir anzuschließen.

description.italian: Trova un compagno che si unisca a te.
description.spanish: Encuentra a alguien que te acompañe

description.english: Beat the first 9 levels of Hero 30.
description.german: Die ersten 9 Level von Held 30 geschafft.

description.italian: Completa i primi 9 livelli.
description.spanish: Supera los primeros 9 niveles
description.japanese: 勇者30　美しき魔王クリア

description.english: Eat 10 types of food.
description.french: Manger 10 types de nourriture
description.italian: Mangia 10 tipi di cibi.
description.spanish: Come 10 tipos de comida
description.japanese: 食事を１０種類食べた

displayName.spanish: Donde manda capitán, no manda marinero

description.english: Ride a ship.
description.german: Das erste mal auf einem Schiff gefahren.
description.french: Monter sur un bâteau
description.italian: Controlla una nave.
description.spanish: Gobierna la nave
description.japanese: 船に乗った

displayName.english: Not Just a Series of Tubes
displayName.italian: Perché nella vita c'è anche il gioco online

description.italian: Gioca alla Modalità Multiplayer Online.
description.spanish: Instrucciones para jugar al multijugador
description.japanese: マルチプレイヤーを１回やった

displayName.english: Do You See What Happens, Larrie?
displayName.german: Leg dich besser nicht mit mir an!
displayName.french: Tu vois ce qu'il se passe, Larrie?
displayName.italian: Vedi cosa succede quando fai il cattivo, Larrie?

description.english: Defeat Larrie and beat Level 4 in 27 seconds or less.
description.german: Larrie besiegt und Level 4 in 27 Sekunden oder weniger geschafft.

description.spanish: Vence a Larry y pasa el nivel 4 en 27 segundos
description.japanese: ジャドーを倒しつつ27秒以内に森の番人セシリアをクリアした

displayName.english: A Real Hero and a Real Human Being
displayName.german: Ich brauche keine Göttin der Zeit!
displayName.italian: Lotta contro la Dea del Tempo

description.english: Beat every level under the target time.

description.spanish: Supera todos los niveles en el límite de tiempo estipulado
description.japanese: すべてのステージを時間を戻さずにクリアした

displayName.english: A Poor Carpenter Blames the Tools
displayName.japanese: 伝説の武器「ボクソード」

description.english: Beat the final boss of Hero 30 using the Wood Sword as a weapon.

displayName.english: Love the Smell of Evil in the Morning.

displayName.spanish: Por malvado que uno sea, siempre hay alguien que es peor
